# scope

The `scope` scope should be used only on `<th>` elements.

The `scope` prop should be used only on `<th>` elements.
>>>>>>> 21d7be62d554915787485641c4ea1187492767dd

## Rule details

This rule takes no arguments.

### Succeed
```jsx
<th scope="col" />
<th scope={scope} />
```

### Fail

```jsx
<div scope />
```
